channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) 2014 Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://info.indiatimes.com/terms/tou.html

item.title: Decision to split with Sena taken with heavy heart: BJP state chief
item.description: BJP's Maharashtra chief announced the break-up of his party's 25-year-old alliance with the Shiv Sena. Differences over CM post led to the split.

item.title: NCP breaks 15-year-old alliance with Congress in Maharashtra
item.description: The NCP on Thursday said it was breaking away from the Congress to fight the Maharashtra assembly polls alone.

item.title: Narendra Modi returns to his stomping ground as PM after 14-year exile
item.description: When Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrives in New York on Friday afternoon (Saturday morning IST), he will be returning to a city that was like his second home in the late-1990s.

item.title: With canal and hut, India stands up to China on disputed frontier
item.description: Earlier this month, the Indian Army stationed on a remote plateau built a small observation hut from where they could watch Chinese soldiers across a disputed border.

item.title: IM men wanted to create Syria-Iraq situation in India: NIA
item.description: National Investigation Agency (NIA) has told the court that their probe has revealed that some of the suspected IM men had wanted to be sent to Syria with other 'jihadis'.
